abstract: Judge rules retrial of Pedro Hernandez, man accused of killing 6-year-old Etan Patz in 1979, will begin after Labor Day; Hernandez's May 2015 trial ended in hung jury.
lead_paragraph: A jury last year failed to reach a decision on Pedro Hernandez’s guilt or innocence in the death of the 6-year-old boy who disappeared in 1979.

headline.main: Judge Says Retrial in Etan Patz Case Will Start in September
headline.print_headline: Retrial for Man Accused of Killing Patz in 1979 Is Scheduled for September

snippet: A jury last year failed to reach a decision on Pedro Hernandez’s guilt or innocence in the death of the 6-year-old boy who disappeared in 1979.
